definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess
compact disc/CD or DVD/CD ROM/CL:片[pian4],張|张[zhang1]
domain/territory under one's control/foundation of a building/base of operations/crust of earth
to make an inventory/to take stock

to spiral/to circle/to go around/to hover/to orbit

sentences.english: Keep the cable coils stacked in the same order as they were when they were on the drum.
sentences.chinese: 在鼓轮上保持钢索盘的旋转方向与原来一致。

sentences.english: Place on a prepared tray, brush the tops lightly with egg.
sentences.chinese: 放在铺好烤纸的烤盘上，刷上蛋液入预热烤箱。

sentences.english: Your price is too high to even interest buyers in counter-offer.
sentences.chinese: 你的价格太高，买方连还盘都没有兴趣。

sentences.english: Your counter-offer is much more modest tha free mine.
sentences.chinese: 你们的还盘比我的要守旧得多。

sentences.english: The game is a draw if both teams lose at once.
sentences.chinese: 若两个队伍同时输掉，则该盘游戏为和局。

sentences.english: The 120-degree CCPM is by far most popular among pilots of all levels.
sentences.chinese: 在各层水平的飞手中，目前120度十字盘最为流行。
大明虾｜盘煎，香蒜，百里香，柠檬。

sentences.english: Eating utensils and food trays are cleaned at the hygiene station with premoistened towelettes.
sentences.chinese: 就餐器具和食物盘在卫生站用预先弄湿的小毛巾清理。

sentences.english: The difference between our price and your counteroffer is too wide.
sentences.chinese: 我方的价格与你方还盘之间差距太大。

sentences.english: The above research results reflect the shock isolation effect and hanging wall effect of fractures.
sentences.chinese: 本研究结果反映断裂的隔震效应与上盘效应。

sentences.english: He was upside down in a tank of water with chains and lodes all around the lank .
sentences.chinese: 他倒立在一个水箱中，水箱外都盘着锁链。

sentences.english: Dessert silverware, if not brought out with the dessert, are placed at the top of your entrée plate.
sentences.chinese: 如果甜品没摆出来，装甜品的银器就放在主菜盘。

sentences.english: Would you like some soup or appetizer to start with you meal ?
sentences.chinese: 请问你要不要先点头盘或汤？

sentences.english: Can broadcast check a document and various digital product of USB inner document.
sentences.chinese: 可以播放USB盘文件和各种数码产品内的文件。

sentences.english: It is well known that accretion disks are hydrodynamic disks with anomalous viscosity.
sentences.chinese: 天体物理吸积盘是具有反常粘滞的流体盘。

sentences.english: It is well known that accretion disks are hydrodynamic disks with anomalous viscosity.
sentences.chinese: 天体物理吸积盘是具有反常粘滞的流体盘。

definition: to interrogate and get to the bottom of sth
to sell up/to wind up a business
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
